transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Halo.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hanji.

Executive: Bridge Lal ji baat kar rahe hain?

Customer: Hanji boliye.

Executive: Bridge Lal ji main Taruna baat kar rahi hun IndiaMART head office se. Actually sir aapka ek matlab aapka Stone Trading company ke naam se na ek feedback generate hua tha mere paas. Thoda wo aapko services. Sir feedback ek generate hua tha aapka matlab ek feedback aaya tha not satisfied ka aapki baat hui hogi account manager se sir. So services ke regarding sir aapne thoda sa negative feedback dala tha not satisfied. Kya problem aa raha hai sir services aapka satisfied aap nahi hain?

Customer: Aapka buyleads vgera ke regarding.

Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Ji boliye.
Boliye.

Customer: Wo wo to madam vese esa hai.
Hmm.

Customer: Wo na kya hai wo to maine IndiaMART ko shubhkamnaen aur dhanyavad dene ke liye wo dala tha kyuki wo kya hai aaj tak jo hai 6 mahine ho gaye aaj tak ek bhi order nahi mila. Main to IndiaMART ki bahut bahut shubhkamnaen dena chah raha tha madam.

Executive: Sir esa nahi hai dekho matlab chhodne wali baat nahi hai sir chize matlab agar dekho koi dikkat hai sir main us chiz se ab dekho mere paas abhi profile aa gaya hai na sir chize thik ho jayega. Aap mujhe batao ki problem kya aa raha hai bas. Lead mein koi problem aa raha hai services uses aap kam kar rahe ho kya dikkat aa raha hai. Mere se bhi agar nahi ho paya na sir to fir aap boliyega ki ha chalo nahi kuch kar paye.

Customer: Kam kyu karu main kam kyu karunga mera kya lena dena hai main to 36000 diye the iske liye to diya tha na.

Executive: Haan bilkul thik hai hmm.

Customer: Humne isliye diye the aapko paise humko do grahak badhenge aapke to jyada badhiya rahega. Hamare aur grahak to aa rahe honge offline to aa rahe hain online bhi do grahak aayenge to badhiya rahega. Tabhi humne 36000 ki jagah hum 3 lakh kamane ke liye kiya tha. Ab 36000 hi hum gir gaye ab kya kare?

Executive: Sahi baat hai. Samajh rahi hun. Ab sir to problem abhi kya ho raha hai matlab ki buylead aap jab consume kar rahe ho to buylead matlab aa sahi nahi raha hai ya kya ho raha hai matlab mil matlab aap se related nahi aa raha?

Customer: Consume karne ke liye kehne matlab hamari gramin bhasha me ye koi rakh bhi nahi hai ye kehna aur kya kahu batao.
Hmm hmm hmm.

Executive: Sir ek kaam kar sakte ho aap mere ko koi time do kal ya jo bhi aap mujhe ek mujhe dena personally time sir kal ya parso.

Customer: Ji aapke Vikas ji uska call aaya tha. Maine kaha bhaiya ye keh rahe the mere bhai sahab consume nahi kar rahe. Maine kaha bhai tu line pe ek maine kaha ye consume kar lu. Bola ye consume kar lu. Bola ye consume kar aap wo bhi vahi consume kar lunga. Ye kaam ki hai kya sari consume kar lu. Ab is prakar aa rahi hai kya unko consume kar lu main. Uska matlab consume kar lena mera fayda ho jayega to bataiye isse ye fayda hoga aap consume kariye kyuki aap keh rahe hain hamare advise keh rahe hain to kyuki ye man lo to aap aapke samne keh raha hun bhai aap ye man lo main kal puchhu isko. Bola bhai sahab ha nahi hai. Thik hai. To to kya aap aap keh rahe ho consume nahi kiya aapne. Main kya karu consume karke kya karu. Ab isko consume kar lu.

Executive: Haan.

Customer: To maine kaha wo fir isliye hai bhai ye man lo aap dhanyavad dene aur shubhkamnaen dene ke alava aapke paas kya bacha hai aapke paas paisa aapke paas poch gaya.

Executive: Ji main samajh gayi sir. Thik hai.

Executive: Ek kaam karte hain sir. Aap mujhe chalo main aapka point pura samajh rahi hun sir aap mere ko ek kal to nahi parso ka time do. Main aap ek baar mere ko na video meet pe connect karna parso. Main ek baar sir thoda sa time nikal ke main na kuch jo chize correct ho sakti hain wo sari chize thik kar dete hain. Thik hai uske baad dekhte hain kaisa buylead aa raha hai ya inquiry base kaisa aa raha hai. Thik hai then fir hum iske bare mein discuss karenge ha jo jo chize hum ji.

Customer: Wo to madam aapke sab aapke hath mein hai aap dekh lijiye.

Executive: Sir pata hai dekhiye aap please ye chiz ye chiz sir dekhiye please.

Customer: Aap keh rahe hain bhai thik karne ke liye taiyar hain kya kare aur batao. Taiyar hain hum to batao.

Executive: Sir main aapka point samajh rahi hun. Haan bilkul sir dekho main chize sir aap se pehle bhi ek baar baat hui thi. Shivam aapke account manager the tab aapki ek ticket open hui thi buylead inquiry ko leke ab wo matlab uska aaya tha mere paas ji update ki matlab aapko competitor vgera bhi maine us time dikhaye the whatsapp group ek maine banwa rahi hun main aapka. Thik hai maine Shivam se even aapka whatsapp group bhi banwaya tha ki sir buylead usme aapko share kar denge aap directly vahan se consume karke dekho. Video meet pe hum hmm.

Customer: Wo group ban ke hi reh gaya madam.

Executive: Sir esa dekho maine aapko sir us time pe aapko ek chiz batati hun sir main Shivam ki aap se baat hui thi dekho buy jo group hai sir buylead us pe hafte mein main maine bhi ye chiz main aapko agree karti hun sir dekho main daily to nahi bhijwaungi but ha main aapko alternate days pe ek do din mein hafte mein aapko bhijwati hun baki aap consume karo. Thik hai. Usme mera nivedan ye hai consume kya kare?

Executive: Ek minute sir aapka point sir dekho aap Bridge Lal ji aap mera point mujhe sunne ka koshish karo na sir main kya bolna chah rahi hun aapko. Buylead kyu nahi aa rahi kharab aa rahi hain to uska hum tod nikalenge na. Chize aap jo bhi chize hain sir aap se baat hui agar agar dekho agar mere ko thik hi nahi karna hota ya kaam hi nahi karwana hota to sir main whatsapp group nahi banwati ya maine even aapko aur bhi chize us pe aapki work karwai hain sir. To hum ek baar product line se related aur kuch chize usme add dekh lete hain sir ki kya kya chize aur chhut rahi hain multiple aur koi product add ho sakte hain jisme aap please karte ho.

Customer: To uske liye ha to uske liye main bas aap se time mang rahi hun ki aap mujhe ek baar Tuesday ka time dena video meet pe hum connect kar lete hain.

Executive: Chalo aapko time nahi hai to parso le lenge aap bata dena mere ko.

Customer: Aapke kal mere ko time nahi tha aaj sunday aaj working tha na to kal chutti hai kal off hai. Acha main aap ye kaam karwa deta hun karwa deta hun.

Executive: Sir time wali baat nahi hai yahan pe baat sirf itni hai sir ki kal off hai kyuki aaj working tha na sunday tha closing tha sir to kal off hai isliye main keh rahi hun ki parso ka time de do ek video meet pe aa jate hain chize samajh lete hain dekh lete hain account manager bhi main aapki change kar dungi parso new account manager assign karungi so that particularly jo aapki buylead vgera pe kaam ho sake.

Customer: Vikas ji ka aslan karke aa gaya tha Vikas moh ne kaha maine usko bhi yahi kaha tha.

Executive: Haan Vikas ne call kiya hoga wo maine sir call karwaya tha wo actually calls hui thi aaj thoda sa to aapko kar diya hoga kyuki Shivam actually sir Shivam jo aapke account manager hain na unki shadi hai to wo chuttiyon pe hain isliye maine Vikas se call karwaya tha aapko.

Customer: Hmm to wo wo ye keh raha tha sir main maine bola main mere ko bataiye aap maine kaha ek to aapko main bahut bahut shubhkamnaen deta hun aur bahut kya shubhkamnaen dene ke alava.

Executive: Sir main samajh rahi hun aapki jagah matlab sir aapka point main bilkul samajh rahi hun main us chiz pe mana nahi kar rahi. Thoda sa sir bas time dijiye chize thik ho jayengi change ho jayengi.

Customer: Ye bhi keh diya tha ki hamara refund kar dijiye. Aapne kaha refundable dhanyavad dene ke alava shubhkamnaen ke alava hamare paas kya bach raha hai kuch nahi bach raha hamare paas.

Executive: Sir main aapka point samajh rahi hun but refund policy to esa kuch hota hi nahi hai na sir. Chize jo hain hum video meet ke liye jarur schedule karti hun main aapke liye aage chize. Thik hai bhi dal.

Executive: Ki main dekh lu ki sari chize dekho sir lead to consume lead consuming aapke side se thoda kam bhi ho rahi hain ab thik hai lead aapke paas agar kam aa rahi hain chize kam aa rahi hain to uske liye maine ek matlab uske liye main solution nikal rahi hun ki aap mujhe.

Customer: Wo kariye ho sakta hai humne kar ke dekh liya kuch bhi nahi hai wo ek hi aata hai ek square foot Bangalore ka aap consume kar rahe ho usko ek square foot chahiye ek square foot jahan mal koi jahan sand stone lekar ke usko PVC chahiye koi sand stone haddi ne tar chahiye ab ye kya consume karne ka fayda kya hai batao hum bhi hum bhi padh likhe aadmi hai thodi jahan mal koi anpadh aadmi to ho sakta hai jahan mal vese hi kar rahi hai.

Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.

Executive: Samajh rahi hun samajh rahi hun.

Customer: Ek mahine pehle bhi vahi kahani ho rahi thi vahi gana ga rahe the jo aaj ga raha hun.
Hmm.
Hmm.

Customer: Hue the aur mere paas ab kya karu vese main ab mere ko to ab yahi hai shubhkamnaen aur dhanyavad dene ke alava kya bacha.

Executive: Sir sir ese mat boliye sir karate hain sir jo bhi hoga thik to karayenge esa nahi hai. Baki ek ticket aapki open hui thi. Haan to maine parso video meet pe kar lete hain. To maine aur bache thik hai dekho esa to nahi hai ki nahi denge sir dekho business agar nahi dena hota to sir dekho isse itna kaam bhi nahi karte esa nahi hai ki hamare hath mein sab kuch hai ha chize hum jo apne end pe jo bilkul aapka solve kar sakte hain sir wo jarur karungi main. Thik hai chize change karni hain baat pehle bhi sir aap dekho na pehle aap bilkul hi buylead vgera consume nahi kar rahe the abhi aapne bich mein do char use kari thi consume karai thi aur aapki kuch kuch chize maine change kari thi us time pe jab aapki ticket aayi. Ab isme aapke dwara aapke IndiaMART ke dwara kisi ne bhej rakha hai na unko dekh lo aap hai na wo wo aapke Vikas kya keh raha tha bolo bhaiya main dekh raha hun maine kaha dekh lo kya unko ek ek chiz gina di maine kaha bhaiya ye lead aayi hai aapke dwara kya isko consume kar lu.
Hmm.
Hmm.

Customer: Isko consume kare unhone last mein ye kaha bhai sahab karne layak nahi hai to kya karu maine kaha abe ab dhanyavad aur shubhkamna ke alava mere paas kya bacha hai ye de raha hun aapko.

Executive: Samajh gayi sir main aapka point samajh gayi. Karwate hain sir baki buylead sir please main yahi bolungi aap buylead consume karna band mat karo na sir dekho jo buylead aapke business se related hi dikh rahi hogi esa to nahi hai ki irrelevant kuch dikh rahi hai ha main ye keh sakti hun aap mujhe bolo bulk lead nahi dikh rahi ya normal lead nahi dikh rahi wo aap keh sakte ho aap usme aap sir consuming karna band kar denge to sir aap dekho inquiry base hi band ho jayega na sir calls aani hi band ho jayengi jab buylead hi consume nahi hogi to. Baki maine ha video meet wala jo point bola hai sir ek kaam karo maine aapko bola hai aap thoda sa parso hum isse connect karte hain.

Customer: Ji main kya bol rahi hun.

Executive: Parso connect karte hain dekh lo aap aa jao samne se dekho jo bhi hoga hum usse jo bhi chize change karni hogi hum dobara se karenge.

Customer: Abhi dekh raha hun madam sahab abhi dekh raha hun abhi aapka dekha hua hai main to ye man lo jab ye nahi hai main door kholta hun lekin koi kaam ki ho to khole dil to dekhe.

Executive: Tabhi to sir main bol rahi hun ki main whatsapp group jo banaya tha sir Shivam abhi available hai nahi na Shivam shadi mein chala gaya uski shadi thi isliye usme abhi buylead vgera kuch kuch time se matlab bhej pa rahe hain kabhi nahi bhej pa rahe hain to maine isliye aapka account manager main change kar dungi parso. Hamare IndiaMART hai na usko padh ke suna deta hun sand stone wall panel do square foot aa raha hai Delhi ka. Matra two square foot. Kya isko batao main consume karu Tulsi point aa raha hai ek.

Executive: Sir maine abhi kya acha maine abhi aapko kya bola hai aapne meri point meri baat suni sir maine kya bola meri aap se ek baar aapko yaad hai sir video meet hui thi bahut lambi tab bhi maine aapko bola tha sari chize samjhai thi aapne us din bhi meri koi bhi baat nahi suni maine us din bhi aapko sari chize samjhai thi meri aap se bahut der tak wo video meet hui thi main abhi bhi aapko vahi chiz bol rahi hun sir ki kuch chize hume time lagta hai sir aap pata hai kya keh rahe ho aapne give up kar de rahe ho aap thoda sa buylead consume karte ho ek do lead buylead consume karte ho ek din nahi aaya do din aaya teesre din aap dekhoge nahi to aap chize aap ye bhi to socho patience level bhi to rakho sir aap bich mein agar wo rhythm hi tod doge to kaise aayega sir. Karte hain usme usse baat bhi karte hain usse baat karte hain usse 6 square foot ke leke to aapne ye kaha tha aapne ye kaha tha bhai aap ye man lo sand stone bhudda.

Executive: Sir dekho aap mujhse aap suno sir aap mere ko ek basic services aapne li hai to aap ek expectation set karne ke liye main sir aap se bilkul bura wo bolungi ki sir dekho aap mujhse ye mat expect karo ki main ekdam aapko sir sidha matlab 20000 30000 laga ke main usse 30 lakh ka kaam de dungi sir chize aayengi ab kaam badhega aayega dhire dhire lekin uska aap aap uses barabar karo ha ha rahi buylead wali baat to buylead wali main baat abhi maine bola hai ki main parso aapka ek account manager change kara ke aapko buylead us pe bhijwati hun do char do char karke aap ek baar try karke dekhna thik hai thik thik thik hai sir chaliye okay okay baki main feedback sir ek aapka wo close kar rahi hun ticket open hua tha wo ticket close kar rahi hun. Main to jab aapke dwara inquiry vahi dunga main aapko feedback jab tak final dene wala nahi sir mere liye sir dekho aapke liye agar maine kaam na kiya ho to aap batao feedback to deoge na jo bhi hai not satisfied matlab yes de do na aapka baki main close karti hun dekhte hain sir kaisa rehta hai aap jane se hamara solution ho gaya ho to bataiye ab hamara koi solution nahi to feedback kya fayda humko. Sir dekho wo chize to maine di hain jo chize main change karungi main usse bol rahi hun thik hai to batao aap dekh ke karte hain parso karenge na sir chize isko change feedback to wo denge jo aap se nahi sir ye ye jo feedback mang rahi hun main wo aap se is call ke liye mang rahi hun ki meri aap se baat hui hai sir us chiz ke liye maine kaam kiya hai aage bhi karenge sab dekhte hain thik hai parso aapko time dete hain parso ho jao taiyar hum ready hain bataiye aap time de de thoda sa ha parso to main bilkul ab video meet pe aate hain sir connect karte hain baki ticket main yahan se ek baar close kar deti hun sir thik hai ji kal parso parso baat kar lete hain koi dikkat nahi hai parso to baat karungi sir main parso to baat karungi main bas ek jo aapke not satisfied aapne dala tha usse ek ticket open hui hai main usko keh rahi hun ki main ticket yahan se apne end se close kar rahi hun baki parso aap se video meet pe ek baar connect kar leti hun thik hai aapko jabhi honge jab humko kehne ka matlab hamara wo ha to aap feedback mujhe parso de dena sir feedback mujhe parso de dena ticket main aaj close kar deti hun feedback to mil jayega na aapke paas feedback pe jo bhi hai parso aap satisfied hoke parso mujhe feedback de dena thik hai thik thik okay.
summary:
\n
Concerns:\n
- Customer has not received any orders.
- Customer is not satisfied with buyleads.
- Customer requested a refund.
\n
Resolution:\n
- Executive assured to resolve the issues.
- Executive offered a video meet to discuss issues.
- Executive offered to change the account manager.
\n
Next Steps: \n
- Video meet scheduled for the day after tomorrow.
\n
Alert (If Any):\n
refund\n
@@@Sentiment:\n
- Angry -> Satisfied\n
\n
@@@Key Topics:\n
- buyleads, refund, account manager, video meet\n
\n
